
2.0.0 / 2013-01-05
==================

  * Drop Node.js 0.6 support (because of hrtime)
  * Add support for high resolution timers
  * Pass iteration index to the benchmarks callback
  * Emit events

1.0.0 / 2012-05-17
==================

  * Split benchmarking and reporting
  * Brand new design
  * Use chai

0.0.1 / 2012-01-27
==================

  * Initial version.
